intro: Aylostera rovidana, commonly known as the African violet, is a flowering plant native to tropical Africa. It belongs to the Gesneriaceae family and is characterized by its showy, tubular flowers that come in a variety of colors. The plant typically has fleshy, dark green leaves with a velvety texture. It thrives in bright, indirect light and requires well-draining soil to prevent root rot. Aylostera rovidana is popular as a houseplant due to its ornamental value and relatively easy care requirements.
